title: I am allergic to the tetanus vaccine. How rare is that reaction?
description: Answer (1 of 6): I have been allergic to the tetanus vaccine since I was a child. I have had many allergies and have had asthma since around 13 years old. When I was a child if someone cut the grass nearby and I was outside, I was told I would blow up like a little balloon and my Mom in the 1960'...
